getGesturesDispatched().name: getGesturesDispatched()
getGesturesDispatched().documentation:
Returns a list of gestures that have been dispatched.

Gestures are dispatched by calling {@link AccessibilityService#dispatchGesture}.

getWindows().name: getWindows()
getWindows().documentation:
Returns a representation of interactive windows shown on the device's default display. Mirrors
the values provided to {@link #setWindows(List<AccessibilityWindowInfo>)}. Returns an empty
list if not set.

getWindowsOnAllDisplays().name: getWindowsOnAllDisplays()
getWindowsOnAllDisplays().documentation:
Returns a representation of interactive windows shown on the device's all displays. An empty
list will be returned for default display and {@code null} will be return for other displays if
they are not set by {@link #setWindowsOnDisplay(int, List)}.

setCanDispatchGestures(boolean).name: setCanDispatchGestures(boolean)
setCanDispatchGestures(boolean).documentation:
Sets whether the service is currently able to dispatch gestures.

If {@code false}, {@link AccessibilityService#dispatchGesture} will return {@code false}.

setTakeScreenshotErrorCode(int).name: setTakeScreenshotErrorCode(int)

setWindows(java.util.List\u003candroid.v.name: setWindows(java.util.List<android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityWindowInfo>)
setWindows(java.util.List\u003candroid.v.documentation:
Sets the list of interactive windows shown on the device's default display as reported by
{@link #getWindows()}

setWindowsOnDisplay(int,java.util.List\u.name: setWindowsOnDisplay(int,java.util.List<android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityWindowInfo>)
setWindowsOnDisplay(int,java.util.List\u.documentation:
Sets the list of interactive windows shown on the device's {@code displayId} display. If the
{@code windowList} is null, we will remove the list with given {@code displayId} display as
reported by {@link #getWindowsOnAllDisplays()}.

unsetTakeScreenshotErrorCode().name: unsetTakeScreenshotErrorCode()

name: org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowAccessibilityService
documentation:
Shadow of AccessibilityService that tracks global actions and provides a mechanism to simulate
the window list.
